/*
   learnt:
 */
#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define ll long long int
#define MP(x,y) make_pair(x,y)
#define F first
#define S second
#define PB(x) push_back(x)
#define rep(x,a,b) for(x=a;x<=b;x++)
#define repd(x,a,b) for(x=a;x>=b;x--)
#define output1(x) cout << #x << " " << x << endl;
#define output2(x,y) cout <<x<<" "<<y <<endl;
#define inp1(x) cin >> x;
#define inp2(x,y) cin >> x >> y;
#define MOD 1000000007
#define ARRSZ 1000009
#define MAX(a,b) a>b?a:b
#define MIN(a,b) a<b?a:b
#define DRT(x) while(x--)
using namespace std;

int n,k;
int main()
{
	int i,j,t,l,l1,cnt;
	string s,stri;
	char *temp,*num;
	inp1(t);
	temp= new char[10];
	num= new char[10];
	DRT(t){
		cnt=0;
		cin >> n >> k;
		// create string
		s.clear();

		rep(i,1,n){
			sprintf(temp,"%d",i);
			s+=temp;
		}
		sprintf(num,"%d",k);
		l=strlen(num);
		l1=s.size();
		string nu(num);
		//cout << nu << endl;
		for(i=0;i+l-1<l1;i++){
			stri=s.substr(i,l);
			if(stri.compare(nu)==0) cnt++;
		}
		//cout << s << endl;
		cout << cnt << endl;

	}
	return 0;
}
